name: Salesforce Site Survey - Slack Alert
description:
**Trigger** : Trigger on create/update site survey

**Description** : We would like to introduce a couple of Slack alerts for Sales Reps and Sales Engineers when a Site Survey is created.

as a Sales Rep, When a Site Survey is created or updated on an Account where I am an Account Team Member, I receive a Slack message informing me of the new Site Survey. 
as a Sales Engineer, When a Site Survey is created or updated on an Account which has an open Opportunity where I am the 'Opportunity SE' or I am a member of the Opportunity Team, I receive a Slack message informing me of the new Site Survey


**Action** : Send the slack alert to sales rep or sales engineer with some detailed site survey info if any of the criteria meet.

input.field_list:
OwnerId
Id
Name
CompanyName__c
EmailAddress__c
R7SolutionsInterest__c
SfdcAccountCaseSafeID__c
SfdcContactCaseSafeID__c
SfdcAccountCaseSafeID__r$SFDC Account CaseSafeID.Id
SfdcAccountCaseSafeID__r$SFDC Account CaseSafeID.Name
SfdcAccountCaseSafeID__r$SFDC Account CaseSafeID.AccountNumber
SfdcAccountCaseSafeID__r$SFDC Account CaseSafeID.OpenOpportunities__c
SfdcContactCaseSafeID__r$SFDC Contact CaseSafeID.Id
SfdcContactCaseSafeID__r$SFDC Contact CaseSafeID.Name
input.query: LastModifiedById NOT IN (SELECT Id FROM User WHERE Alias = 'workato')

Id
AccountId
StageName
Name
TAOwner__c
TAOwner__r$Opportunity SE.FirstName
TAOwner__r$Opportunity SE.LastName
TAOwner__r$Opportunity SE.Email
input.query: AccountId = '#{_('data.salesforce.f325d3a1.SfdcAccountCaseSafeID__c')}' AND (StageName != 'Closed Won' AND StageName != 'Closed Lost' AND StageName != 'Rejected')

extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.
